head.title: Welcome to WSO2 Business Process Server (BPS) v@product.version@

body.h1: Welcome to WSO2 Business Process Server (BPS) v@product.version@
body.p:
WSO2 Business Process Server (BPS) is an easy-to-use Open Source Business Process Server that executes business processes written following WS-BPEL standard. WS-BPEL is emerging as the de-facto standard for composing multiple synchronous and asynchronous web services into collaborative and transactional process flows which increase the flexibility and agility of your Service Oriented Architecture. @product.name@ is powered by Apache ODE and available under
Apache Software License v2.0. @product.name@ provides a complete Web based graphical console to deploy, manage and monitor business process and process instances.

@product.name@ is developed on top of the revolutionary Carbon platform (Middleware a' la carte), and is based on the OSGi framework to achieve the better modularity for you SOA. Carbon platform contains lots of new features and many other optional components that can be used to customize or enhance the functionalities provided by BPS to suits you SOA needs. In addition to installing optional components you can uninstall unwanted features without any trouble.
You can download the distribution from Project Download Page and give it a try.
It's really easy to get started with @product.name@. No complex configurations, just download, install and deploy your processes.

ol.li: Try out the samples comes with @product.name@.
For high level feature list look at the release notes.
Join developer mailing list and correspond with the developers directly.
Use WSO2 Business Process Server discussion forum to raise your questions.
Report any issues or enhancement requests at public JIRA.

ul.li:
WSO2 Carbon integration layer for Apache ODE with multi-tenancy support.
Current integration layer is the first phase of supporting native multi-tenancy in BPEL engine. And this will further allows us to increase the utilization of features provided by WSO2 Carbon platform.

Patched Apache ODE 1.3.4 as BPEL engine.
Apache ODE 1.3.4 contains various stability fixes to and improvements to BPEL engine. We have patched Apache ODE 1.3.4 to support BPEL extensions and have done various other fixes which are specific to WSO2 Carbon integration.
